mapper.sql: mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, mcp.request_date, mcp.pay_date, mcp.start_date, mcp.end_date, mcp.star_rate, mcp.review, mcp.review_date, mcp.etc
m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email
mapper.select: select mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.request_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as request_date, mcp.pay_date, mcp.start_date, mcp.end_date, mcp.star_rate, mcp.review, mcp.review_date, mcp.etc, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id, m.photo, m.name as member_name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no where cp.coach_no = #{no} and mcp.status REGEXP ('요청대기중|결제대기중') AND cp.delete_status IS NULL

select mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.request_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as request_date, mcp.pay_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.start_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as start_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.end_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as end_date, mcp.star_rate, mcp.review, mcp.review_date, mcp.etc, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id, m.photo, m.name as member_name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no where mcp.member_program_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update member_coaching_programs set status=#{status}, pay_date=now() where member_program_no=#{memberCoachingProgramNo}
update member_coaching_programs set remark=#{remark}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=DATE_ADD(#{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) where member_program_no=#{no}
mapper.select: select member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, remark, status, request_date, pay_date, start_date, end_date, star_rate, review, DATE_FORMAT(review_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as review_date, etc, c.name program_name, substring(m.id,1,4) id from member_coaching_programs mcp join coaching_programs c on mcp.program_no=c.program_no join members m on mcp.member_no=m.member_no where mcp.program_no=#{no}

select member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, review, star_rate, DATE_FORMAT(review_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as review_date, c.name program_name, substring(m.id,1,4) id from member_coaching_programs mcp join coaching_programs c on mcp.program_no=c.program_no join members m on mcp.member_no=m.member_no where mcp.program_no=#{no} and review is not NULL ORDER BY review_date DESC

select member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, remark, status, request_date, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as pay_date, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as end_date, etc, cp.name program_name, cp.fee as fee, m.name as member_name from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on mcp.program_no=cp.program_no where cp.coach_no = #{no} AND pay_date IS NOT NULL AND status = '진행중' order by start_date desc

select member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, remark, status, request_date, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as pay_date, start_date, end_date, star_rate, review, DATE_FORMAT(review_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as review_date, etc, cp.name program_name, cp.fee as fee, m.name as member_name from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on mcp.program_no=cp.program_no where cp.coach_no = #{no} AND pay_date IS NOT NULL

select member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, remark, status, request_date, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as pay_date, start_date, end_date, star_rate, review, DATE_FORMAT(review_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as review_date, etc, cp.name program_name, cp.fee as fee, m.name as member_name from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on mcp.program_no=cp.program_no where m.member_no = #{no} AND pay_date IS NOT NULL AND end_date > cast(now() as date)

select member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, remark, status, request_date, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as pay_date, start_date, end_date, star_rate, review, DATE_FORMAT(review_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as review_date, etc, cp.name program_name, cp.fee as fee, m.name as member_name from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on mcp.program_no=cp.program_no where cp.coach_no = #{no} AND pay_date between #{sDate} AND #{eDate}
mapper.insert: insert into member_coaching_programs( member_no, program_no, remark, status, request_date, start_date, end_date ) values( #{memberNo}, #{programNo}, #{remark}, '요청대기중', now(), #{startDate}, DATE_ADD(#{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) )
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_coaching_programs where member_no=#{no}
select count(*) from member_coaching_programs where member_no=#{no} and status=#{status}

select mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.request_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as request_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.pay_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as pay_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.start_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as start_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.end_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as end_date, mcp.etc, mcp.review, cp.name program_name, cp.fee, cp.coaching_type, c.name from member_coaching_programs mcp join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no=mcp.program_no join coaches c on cp.coach_no=c.coach_no where mcp.member_no=#{no} order by mcp.member_program_no desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
